extends Object

        protected void addDeprecateMessage(String what,
                       ServiceObject serviceObject)
        Adds a message to the message variable of the service object to inform the caller that the method used is deprecated.

        what - What is deprecated. Ex. LoginService.login
        serviceObject - The service object to update.

        authToken - Authtoken
        Returns:

      • handleException

        @ExceptionHandler
@ResponseBody
public ServiceObject handleException(Exception e)
        The exception handler to be called if there is a exception in one of the service methods. This is managed by spring and does not need to be called directly. This is a general exception handler
        Parameters:
        e - a Exception object.
        Returns:
        a ServiceObject object.
